## WhereBuilder.or() method

Add an `or` clause.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
or(...w: (Where<MT> | Where<MT>[])[]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  w | <code>(Where&lt;MT&gt; &#124; Where&lt;MT&gt;[])[]</code> | One or more where objects |
